trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Jamestown
There were no other sightings in Jamestown on or around May 22nd 2013
Summary: tiangle formation of lights passing dierectly overhead
divs: Sighting DetailsI heard a strange animal outside and went to investigate. I looked up at the sky, and at that point I saw three lights in a tiangle formation gliding directly overhead from South to North above the pachy clouds making no sound, and fading out until I could not see them anymore. this all took place at dusk, when the sun was slightly above the horizon, so there was light enough to see if these had been airplanes.
